text_block_list.text: It's been a bit since I came knocking on the gates of Tracen Academy. Today, finally, my new lifestyle begins……!

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Nice to meet you, Trainer <username>. I'm the Chief Trainer of the team that you've joined.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: As you can see, I've gotten quite old. The time I'll have to spend teaching you might be short but…… sub-trainer, I look forward to working with you.
choice_data_list: Yes! I look forward to working with you!

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Fufufu, good answer. I have high hopes for you, so work hard, okay? After all, I did spend quite a bit of time observing you before I chose you.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's get to it―― shall we go meet those all-important Uma Musume?
Newcomers to the academy will often become a sub-trainer underneath a veteran, helping their team, until they've gained enough experience to lead their own.
This time, I was the sub to a true veteran, Chief Trainer. The Uma Musume we're responsible for is――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa…… I've finished the menu, Trainer. I'm ready for the next assignment, please.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Good work, Bell-chan. Next up is parallel running but…… do you have a moment before we start? ――He's the one we talked about before, the sub-trainer.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Good work, Bell-chan. Next up is parallel running but…… do you have a moment before we start? ――She's the one we talked about before, the sub-trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Hello.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ah…… right. Umm, pleased to meet you.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Sub-trainer, once again, her name is Bell-chan…… Mejiro Dober. An important, precious Uma Musume of my team.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Sub-trainer, once again, her name is Bell-chan…… Mejiro Dober. An important, precious Uma Musume of my team.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: For me, she'll probably be the last Uma Musume that I train. As you can see, I've become quite the old lady.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Trainer……

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Oh, I'm sorry, it's fine Bell-chan! I'm still quite healthy, so don't make such a lonely face.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ――Excuse me. I've come to help with parallel running training, are we ready to start?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course! Thanks for coming, Air Groove-san. Bell-chan, are you ready?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Yes……! Senpai, I look forward to running with you!
And so, parallel training for Mejiro Dober and Air Groove began.
Her training partner had earned the nickname "Empress". Someone who, like her mother, had the strength to win the G1 『Oaks』.
Mejiro Dober on the other hand, was someone who hadn't debuted yet. But it seemed like she was able to keep up――!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa…… Haaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ……! Fu, not bad……!!
Using her whole body, built up from physical training, she was able to show such wonderful speed. I could feel the innate talent. However, that's not all――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Not yet, not yeeeeet!! ――Aaaaaaaaaaah!!
To the end, never giving up, pushing further and further forward with the determination to win. That strong will left a striking impression……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Haaa, Haaa, Haaa…… thank you…… very much……!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: No problem. Looks like…… you've gotten stronger, Dober. That was some magnificent speed.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: No, that's not true…… my position taking and drive timing, are still lacking. In the end, I wasn't able to pull ahead of senpai even once…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Haha, I won't let you pull ahead that easily. But, I could definitely feel you pulling up behind me…… You've got yourself a good trainer, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Yes……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I'm still far, far too weak… but if it looks like I've gotten even a little bit stronger, that's all because of Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Yes, yes! Bell-can, that was a really good run, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Oh my! Fufu, your eyes are sparkling. ……That's right, I knew you were the kind of trainer that would look that way.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: ……She's amazing isn't she? Bell-chan. Her mind and body, both are overflowing with possibilities.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: That girl's wonderful future, I want to keep watching over her but――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer! I'm not tired yet so, before cooldown, can I run a bit more with senpai outside the school?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Well well, Bell-chan, lately you've been really fired up! Let's see, if it's just one lap that should be fine. Go at a light pace, okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Okay, thank you very much. I'll be off!

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: ……alright, shall we get to the clean up work then?
That day, I couldn't stop thinking about Mejiro Dober's amazing running while I was helping Chief Trainer……

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hm…… wait, Dober.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huh……? Oh――

text_block_list.name: Reporters
text_block_list.text: Ryan-san! Ryan-san! Mejiro Ryan-san, please look this way!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: The other day, you had a particularly splendid performance, Mejiro Ryan-san! A large number of fans have high expectations for next time, what are your thoughts?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Um……! I'm really happy they're rooting for me! In order to meet their expectations, I'll be training vigorously again!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ――Let's circle around back. Come on, Dober.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Okay…… senpai.
